price: Lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, ãyõyi* sun kasance ga Yũsufu da 'yan'uwansa** dõmin mãsu tambaya.
arabic: ۞ لَّقَدۡ كَانَ فِي يُوسُفَ وَإِخۡوَتِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّلسَّآئِلِينَ
footnotes: * Ãyõyi a nan, anã nufin hãlãye waɗanda suka zama darussa na kõyarwa ga mutãne dõmin tarbiyya ga yãra da manya na kõwane matsayi ga rãyuwar ɗan Ãdam. ** Yũsufu da ɗan'uwansa shaƙĩƙi, Binyãmĩnu, da sauran gõma. Babbansu ga shekaru, shi ne Raubĩlu, kuma sai Lãwiya. A cikin gidansa aka yi Annabãwa, sai Yahũza kuma shĩ ne shũgabansu a ra'ayi, shĩ ne uban sarãkunansu, sabõda haka sũnansa ya rinjãya a kan ƙabĩlar, aka ce musu Yahũdu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laqad kāna fī yūsufa wa-ikh'watihi āyātun lilssāilīna
